body.name: Snuggle Exhilarations"Blue Iris" Fabric Softener Liquid, 96 Fl Oz, 112 Loads (Pack of 3)
body.stockDetail: Only 4 left in stock - order soon.
features: Delight your senses with Blue Iris & Ocean Breeze scent, a fresh burst of blue Iris and bamboo flowers mixed with crisp green apple in combination with soft bamboo and woody notes.
Using fabric softener in the wash can provide better softness, better freshness, reducing wrinkles, and reducing static cling to the fabrics in your clothes, towels, and sheets.
Add Snuggle brand liquid fabric softener during the final rinse cycle or use an automatic dispenser for added convenience.
Safe for standard and HE washing machines.
Includes one 96 ounce bottle of liquid fabric softener, enough for 112 loads.
body.description: Delight your senses with Blue Iris & Ocean Breeze scent, a fresh burst of blue Iris and bamboo flowers mixed with crisp green apple in combination with soft bamboo and woody notes. Using fabric softener in the wash can provide better softness, better freshness, reducing wrinkles, and reducing static cling to the fabrics in your clothes, towels, and sheets. For a top loader washing machine, add Snuggle brand liquid fabric softener during the final rinse cycle or use an automatic dispenser for added convenience. To avoid spotting, do not pour Snuggle directly onto clothes. For a front loader machine, add Snuggle brand liquid fabric softener to the built-in fabric softener tray that is often placed to the right or left of the detergent tray. Safe for standard and HE washing machines. Includes one 96 ounce bottle of liquid fabric softener.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Way better than Downy!
reviews.reviewText: I was a Downy lover for so many years. I finally tried Snuggle and was really amazed. This one is now my favorite softener smell and it works so well, making our clothes so soft and the value is terrific! I highly recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 26, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Is this the real thing?
reviews.reviewText: Smells like snuggle but this is very thin and my clothes are so static after drying that you would question if I even used fabric softener.
